name: npm-build-tool
description: How to Use npm as a Build Tool

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:js --npm-build-tool:dir=test
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:markup
scripts.build:watch: parallelshell 'npm run build:js:watch' 'npm run build:css:watch' 'npm run build:markup:watch'
scripts.build:js: browserify $npm_package_config_dir/my-module.js > dist/js/main.js && cd dist && hashmark -l 8 -m ../assets.json js/main.js 'js/main.{hash}.js' && rimraf js/main.js && cd ..
scripts.build:js:watch: watch 'npm run clean:js && npm run build:js' $npm_package_config_dir/
scripts.build:css: stylus -u autoprefixer-stylus -p assets/styles/main.styl | cssmin > dist/css/main.min.css && cd dist && hashmark -l 8 -m ../assets.json css/main.min.css 'css/main.{hash}.min.css' && rimraf css/main.min.css && cd ..
scripts.build:css:watch: watch 'npm run clean:css && npm run build:css' assets/styles/
scripts.build:markup: pwd && cat assets.json && jade assets/markup/index.jade --obj assets.json -o dist/
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/js && mkdir dist/css
scripts.dev: npm run open:dev -s & parallelshell 'npm run live-reload' 'npm run serve' 'npm run build:watch'

author: Alberto Cubero Navas
